Lyric:
[by:OctobersVeryOwn]
[00:01.74]It may not mean nothing to y'all
[00:04.92]But understand nothing was done for me
[00:07.75]So I don't plan on stopping at all
[00:10.83]I want this shit forever, man
[00:13.92]I'm shutting shit down in the mall
[00:16.95]And telling every girl she the one for me
[00:20.30]And I ain't even planning to call
[00:23.10]I want this shit forever, man

[00:30.60]Last name Ever, first name Greatest
[00:33.73]Like a sprained ankle, boy I ain't nothing to play with
[00:36.87]Started off local but thanks to all the haters
[00:39.49]I know G-IV pilots on a first name basis
[00:42.87]In your city faded off the brown, Nino
[00:45.81]She insist she got more class, we know
[00:48.79]Swimming in the money, come and find me, Nemo
[00:51.87]If I was at the club you know I balled, chemo
[00:55.50]Dropped the mixtape, that shit sounded like an album
[00:58.50]Who'd a thought a countrywide tour be the outcome
[01:00.99]Labels want my name beside a X like Malcolm
[01:04.70]Everybody got a deal, I did it without one
[01:07.59]Yeah, nigga I'm about my business
[01:10.90]Killing all these rappers, you would swear I had a hit list
[01:13.20]Everyone who doubted me is asking for forgiveness
[01:15.86]If you ain't been a part of it, at least you got to witness, bitches

[01:20.88]It may not mean nothing to y'all
[01:23.63]But understand nothing was done for me
[01:26.64]So I don't plan on stopping at all
[01:29.75]I want this shit forever, man
[01:32.95]I'm shutting shit down in the mall
[01:35.86]And telling every girl she the one for me
[01:38.99]And I ain't even planning to call
[01:41.97]I want this shit forever, man

[01:44.12]Ever-ever, Mr. West is in the building
[01:46.62]Ain't no question who about to kill 'em
[01:49.50]I used to have hood dreams, big fame, big chains
[01:52.97]I stuck my dick inside this life until that bitch came
[01:55.93]And went hard, all fall like the ball teams
[01:59.16]Just so I can make it rain all spring
[02:02.25]Y'all seen my story, my glory
[02:04.50]I had raped the game young, you can call it statutory
[02:07.54]When a nigga blow up they gonna build statues for me
[02:10.87]Old money, Benjamin Button "What?" nothin'
[02:14.24]Now super bad chicks giving me McLovin
[02:17.50]You would think I ran the world like Michelle's husband
[02:20.45]You would think these niggas know me when they really doesn't
[02:23.30]Like they was down with the old me
[02:24.84]No you fucking wasn't
[02:27.90]Um, you're such a fucking loser
[02:29.45]He ain't even go to class, Bueller
[02:32.40]Trade the Grammy plaques just to have my Granny back
[02:35.40]Remember she had that bad hip like a fanny pack?
[02:38.43]Chasing the stardom will turn you to a maniac
[02:41.62]All the way in Hollywood and I can't even act
[02:44.57]They pull the cameras out and goddamn, he snap
[02:47.64]I used to want this thing forever, y'all can have it back

[02:51.88]It may not mean nothing to y'all
[02:54.91]But understand nothing was done for me
[02:57.83]So I don't plan on stopping at all
[03:01.30]I want this shit forever, man
[03:04.10]I'm shutting shit down in the mall
[03:06.97]And telling every girl she the one for me
[03:10.60]And I ain't even planning to call
[03:13.40]I want this shit forever, man

[03:20.28]Okay, hello it's the Martian, Space Jam Jordans
[03:23.82]I want this shit forever, wake up and smell the garden
[03:26.92]Fresher than the harvest, step up to the target
[03:29.68]If I had one guess then I guess I'm just New Orleans
[03:32.85]And I will never stop like I'm running from the cops
[03:35.96]Hop up in my car and told my chauffeur to the top
[03:39.19]Life is such a fucking roller coaster then it drops
[03:41.94]But what should I scream for
[03:43.58]This is my theme park
[03:45.35]My mind shine even when my thoughts seem dark
[03:48.21]Pistol on my side, you don't wanna hear that thing talk
[03:51.55]Let the king talk, check the price and pay attention
[03:54.50]Lil' Wayne, that's what they gotta say or mention
[03:57.52]I'm like Nevada in the middle of the summer
[04:00.50]I'm resting in the lead, I need a pillow and a cover
[04:03.29]Shhh, my foot's sleeping on the gas
[04:06.38]No brake pads, no such thing as last uh

[04:10.77]It may not mean nothing to y'all
[04:13.92]But understand nothing was done for me
[04:16.82]So I don't plan on stopping at all
[04:19.94]I want this shit forever, man
[04:22.99]I'm shutting shit down in the mall
[04:25.98]And telling every girl she the one for me
[04:29.12]And I ain't even planning to call
[04:32.70]I want this shit forever, man

[04:39.79]There they go, packin' stadiums as Shady spits his flow
[04:42.67]Nuts they go, Macadamian they go so ballistic, whoa
[04:45.87]He can make them look like bozos
[04:47.19]He's wondering if he should spit this slow, fuck no
[04:49.48]Go for broke, his cup just runneth over, oh no
[04:51.85]He ain't had him a buzz like this
[04:53.22]Since the last time that he overdosed
[04:54.94]They been waiting patiently for Pinocchio to poke his nose
[04:56.99]Back into the game and they know
[04:59.34]Rap will never be same as before
[05:01.21]Bashing in the brains of these hoes 
[05:02.41]And establishing the name as he goes
[05:03.97]The passion in the flame is ignited
[05:05.59]You can't put it out once we light it
[05:07.80]This shit is exactly what the fuck
[05:08.41]That I'm talking about when we riot
[05:10.39]You dealing with a few true villains
[05:11.68]Who stand inside of a booth, truth spilling
[05:13.17]And spit true feelings until our tooth fillings
[05:14.64]Come flying up outta of our mouths, now rewind it
[05:16.23]Pay back mothafucka for the way that you got at me
[05:18.64]How's it taste?
[05:19.25]When I slap the taste outta your mouth
[05:20.68]With the bass so loud that it shakes the place
[05:22.53]I'm Hannibal Lecter, so just in case you're thinking of saving face
[05:25.36]You ain't gonna have no face to save
[05:26.59]By the time I'm through with this place, so Drake

[05:30.50]It may not mean nothing to y'all
[05:32.84]But understand nothing was done for me
[05:35.84]So I don't plan on stopping at all
[05:38.89]I want this shit forever, man
[05:41.91]I'm shutting shit down in the mall
[05:44.99]And telling every girl she the one for me
[05:48.50]And I ain't even planning to call
[05:51.10]I want this shit forever, man
